product_name: Victorinox CH 22 Limited Edition Expandable Wheeled Luggage
long_description: The easy-rolling Victorinox CH 22 Limited Edition Expandable Wheeled Luggage lets you increase its capacity to bring gifts or to collect momentos during your trip. Limited-edition camo print designed with the Victorinox logo has a bright orange lining so you can easily find smaller items. One-touch, dual-trolley aluminum handle system recesses into bag when not in use. Inline skate wheels on the Victorinox CH 22 provide a smooth roll and easy handling. Top and side haul handles enable easy grip and lifting; compression straps inside and out help stabilize the load. Exterior has a top zippered pocket ideal for tickets and a vertical-zip front pocket for quick-access items. Interior organization includes a zippered hanging pocket, large interior door pocket with a zippered U-shape opening, and an internal mesh zippered pocket. Spacious main compartment expands 2 in. (5cm) for additional packing room. Includes Travel Sentry(R)-approved luggage lock, which allows U.S. airport security screeners to open the lock without destroying it and relock it after inspection. Victorinox CH 22 Limited Edition Expandable Wheeled Luggage offers a slide-in ID window. Removable Attach-a-Bag strap secures an additional bag (not included) weighing up to 30 lbs. to the front of the CH 22 for consolidated travel. This item meets carry-on size restrictions for most airlines (size not to exceed 45 linear inches when adding L+W+H; this is subject to change, so check with your airline).
short_description: The easy-rolling Victorinox CH 22 Limited Edition Expandable Wheeled Luggage lets you increase its capacity to bring gifts or to collect momentos during your trip.
